Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2018 02:23PM Madre9295 wrote: Thank you! We’re you able to do anything to help with the pain? My doc is no help...
Posts.Title: Large swelling-like a sausage under arm pits post mastectomy. Madre9295 ps0705

Posts.Content: Madre9295 wrote: I had bilateral mastectomy with pedical tram flap reconstruction on December 21. I have large painful and hard rolls of swelling beneath my armpits. PS says it is normal and will go away. Anyone have ideas for softening the hardness? So tired of it. Still have in four drains...this is my first post-thank you!! Melissa Dx 11/1/2017, IDC, Left, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (FISH) Surgery 12/20/2017 Mastectomy: Left, Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (left): Pedicled TRAM flap; Reconstruction (right): Pedicled TRAM flap Log in to post a reply
